Nemesis Enforcer/Koga Shuko/Stinkbomb:

::Koga Shuko slammed his fist on his chair, quickly strapping himself in, 
Unitron disappearing to rally the troops or some crazy thing like that::
"Killer, what region of this Primus foresaken rock will we be crashing on?!"

==========

::Nemesis sighed, setting the mining equipment on the ground, beginning to 
cut a chunk of energon out of a wall with a laser cutter::

==========

::Stinkbomb took out a knife, reaching into the back of the control panel's 
outlet, cutting some wires, reaching into subspace, and pulling out a charge, 
sticking the charge in the back, reattaching the wires to conceal the bomb, 
adding a thin plate of metal to make it look like a solid sheet of metal was 
there, and then reattached the control panel back on::
"There, good as new!"  ::Stinkbomb said, though the control panel only worked 
semi productively, still needing a little bit of repairs::

::Stinkbomb went over to a huge cylinder shaped piece of machinery, where it 
had been shot up at::"Ah...the energy core...it's working at 87% efficiency 
and slowly rising.  So all it needs to do is fix itself internally, and I'll 
repair the outside."
::Stinkbomb took out a charge, sticking it into the only gash in the energy 
core it would fit in (by energy core, I mean the power generator, you know, 
something similar to that, I don't know the exact name), then welding metal 
plates over all of the gashes::
"Better red than dead, as I always say!"
::Stinkbomb chuckled, heading for the Ark's bridge::
